Elita/Windlord:

Windlord took glenty the baby and said "Her name is ELita, Cam... Her 
dad is Rodimus Prime and he's the commander of this base... and her 
mom..." Windlord had to do a big effort to don't sob, but her eyes 
were full with tears "HEr mom is prisioner of war in Predacons 
hands... Listen me, Cam, Her dad is very sad and he tried to help her 
mom... but he's very hurted and if he goes he will die, I hardly 
bring him back... Now don't mention her mom infront of him... Agree, 
Cam?"
